original_text: After Jacob and his family went to Egypt, your ancestors called to the Lord for help. The Lord sent Moses and Aaron to help them. They led your ancestors out of Egypt. They brought them to live here in this land.
korean_text: 야곱이 애굽에 들어간 후 너희 조상들이 여호와께 부르짖으매 여호와께서 모세와 아론을 보내사 그 두 사람으로 너희 조상들을 애굽에서 인도해 내어 이 곳에 살게 하셨으나

sentences.original_text: After Jacob and his family went to Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱과 그의 가족이 이집트로 간 후에

sentences.original_text: your ancestors called to the Lord for help
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 조상들은 도움을 구하려고 주께 부르짖었습니다

sentences.original_text: The Lord sent Moses and Aaron
They led your ancestors out of Egypt
They brought them to live here
